name: Jack Daniel's
description: An iconic American whiskey charcoal mellowed for a smooth taste. Enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in cocktails.

name: Gorbachoff
description: A clean and crisp vodka, perfect for mixing in cocktails or enjoying neat.

name: Red Label
description: A well-rounded blended scotch whisky known for its smooth and easy-drinking character.

name: DELAFORCE Fine White Port
description: A sophisticated blend of selected white port wines, offering a delicate balance of fruity and nutty flavors with a subtle hint of oak. Ideal as an aperitif or paired with light desserts.

name: Royal Oporto Tawny
description: A rich and smooth tawny port with notes of caramel, dried fruits, and a touch of spice. Perfect for enjoying on its own or with cheese and nuts.

name: MC Marques Campoalto Cremovo
description: A velvety and indulgent cream sherry with luscious flavors of caramel, toffee, and roasted nuts. Best served chilled as a dessert wine.

name: Choya Original
description: A classic umeshu (Japanese plum wine) with a sweet and tangy taste, featuring the natural flavor of ripe plums. Enjoy it on the rocks or as a refreshing cocktail mixer.

name: Nuwang Lychee
description: An exotic lychee liqueur with a fragrant aroma and a sweet, tropical taste. Perfect for adding a touch of luxury to cocktails or enjoying chilled as a digestif.

name: Baeren Met Edelherb
description: A traditional German honey liqueur with a subtle bitterness and a delicate herbal finish. Enjoy it neat, warmed, or mixed in hot beverages for a comforting treat.

name: Choya Sake
description: A smooth and fragrant sake with a clean taste and a hint of sweetness. Serve it chilled as an accompaniment to Japanese cuisine or enjoy it on its own.

name: Deus Samos
description: A velvety sweet wine from the Greek island of Samos, boasting luscious flavors of ripe apricots, honey, and floral notes. Perfect as a dessert wine or paired with fruit-based desserts.

name: TIO PE Palomino Fino
description: A crisp and dry fino sherry with a delicate aroma and flavors of almonds and sea salt. Enjoy it well-chilled as an aperitif or paired with seafood tapas.

name: Martini Torino Alkofrei
description: A non-alcoholic alternative to the classic Martini, featuring aromatic herbs and botanicals for a sophisticated flavor profile. Perfect for those seeking a alcohol-free aperitif option.

name: Cinzano Bianco
description: A classic Italian vermouth with a delicate sweetness and herbal complexity. Ideal for mixing in cocktails or enjoying on the rocks with a twist of citrus.

name: Belsazar Wein Aperitif
description: A premium German aperitif wine crafted with selected wines and botanicals, offering a harmonious balance of sweetness and bitterness. Enjoy it chilled with a slice of orange.

name: Martini Laperitivo
description: An Italian aperitivo crafted with aromatic herbs, citrus fruits, and a hint of bitterness. Perfect for creating refreshing spritz cocktails or enjoying over ice with soda water.

name: Don Giovanni Bianco
description: A smooth and aromatic Italian bianco vermouth with a balanced sweetness and herbal complexity. Ideal for mixing in cocktails or enjoying on its own as an aperitif.

name: Unicum Zwack
description: A legendary Hungarian herbal liqueur with a bold and complex flavor profile featuring over 40 herbs and spices. Enjoy it as a digestive after a hearty meal.

name: Becherovka
description: A traditional Czech herbal liqueur with a bittersweet taste and a blend of aromatic herbs and spices. Enjoy it neat as a digestive or mixed in cocktails.

name: Jaegermeister
description: A German herbal liqueur with a complex blend of 56 herbs, fruits, and spices, offering a bittersweet taste with notes of citrus and licorice. Enjoy it chilled as a shot or mixed in cocktails.

name: St. Hubertus Likor
description: A smooth and indulgent herbal liqueur from the Austrian Alps, featuring a blend of alpine herbs and spices. Enjoy it neat or mixed in cocktails for a taste of the mountains.

name: Schwarzwald Teufel
description: A fiery German herbal liqueur with intense flavors of herbs and spices, including juniper, cinnamon, and cloves. Enjoy it as a shot or in cocktails for a bold kick.

name: Ramazzotti Il Premio
description: An Italian amaro liqueur with a rich and complex flavor profile, featuring notes of orange peel, vanilla, and aromatic herbs. Enjoy it neat or mixed in cocktails.

name: Penninger Blutwurz
description: A traditional Bavarian herbal liqueur made with wormwood and other botanicals, offering a bittersweet taste with hints of spice. Enjoy it as a digestive after a hearty meal.

name: Bio Kraeuterlikoer
description: An organic herbal liqueur crafted with a blend of aromatic herbs and spices, offering a harmonious balance of sweetness and bitterness. Enjoy it chilled as a digestive or in cocktails.

name: Cynar Ricetta
description: An Italian bitter liqueur made with artichokes and a secret blend of herbs and spices, offering a unique bittersweet taste. Enjoy it on the rocks or in cocktails.

name: Tunel De Mallorca
description: A traditional Mallorcan herbal liqueur with a smooth and aromatic taste, featuring flavors of citrus fruits, herbs, and spices. Enjoy it neat or mixed in cocktails.

name: Aperol Aperitivo
description: An Italian aperitivo with a bright orange color and a bittersweet taste, featuring flavors of orange, rhubarb, and herbs. Perfect for creating refreshing spritz cocktails.

name: Absinth 66
description: A potent absinthe with a high alcohol content and intense flavors of anise, wormwood, and herbs. Enjoy it diluted with water or in classic absinthe cocktails.

name: Bunter Hund Steng
description: A German herbal liqueur with a vibrant red color and a fruity flavor profile, featuring notes of berries and herbs. Enjoy it neat or mixed in cocktails.

name: Absinth 66 1924
description: A vintage-inspired absinthe with a high alcohol content and traditional flavors of anise, wormwood, and botanicals. Enjoy it in the classic absinthe ritual.

name: Stichpimpuli
description: A mysterious herbal liqueur with a unique name and flavor profile, featuring a blend of herbs, spices, and botanicals. Enjoy it as a shot or mixed in cocktails.

name: Aperitivo Heimat
description: A German-style aperitivo with a refreshing taste and a blend of herbs and citrus fruits. Perfect for creating spritz cocktails or enjoying on its own.

name: Ricard Pastis de Marseille
description: A classic French pastis with a bold and aromatic flavor profile, featuring notes of anise, licorice, and herbs. Enjoy it diluted with water or mixed in cocktails.

name: Yeni Raki 1937
description: A traditional Turkish raki with a rich and complex flavor profile, featuring notes of anise, herbs, and a hint of sweetness. Enjoy it chilled as an aperitif or paired with meze.

name: Kuestennebel Sternanis
description: A German liqueur with a smooth and aromatic taste, featuring the distinctive flavor of star anise. Enjoy it neat or mixed in cocktails for a touch of spice.
